EE217 HOMEWORK 3 - PROBLEM 1A
PRBS SEQUENCES
================================================================================

================================================================================
PRBS7 (2^3-1 = 7 bits)
Length: 7 bits
Period: 2^3 - 1 = 7
================================================================================

1101101

First 20 bits: 1101101
Last 20 bits:  1101101

Statistics:
  Number of 1s: 5
  Number of 0s: 2
  Ratio (1s/0s): 5/2

Period: 2^7 - 1 = 127
